title: how do i contact LOL company to fix my issue???
body: my computer keeps getting shut down mid game and i keep getting banned for supposedly leaving mid game. how do i contact the LOL game company so i can fix this problem????

replies.body: Usually computers will shut down as a safety precaution, which can be due to overheating hardware or malfunction.  When you have some time run our Hextech Repair Tool which will gather a set of logs, then attach it in a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support.  Our tech team can look into this and offer more insight!  Hope that helps!
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us they will ask for logs and data make sure you give it to them or else you'll just be wasting everyone's time.
